sn22.36:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.36:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.36:1.7: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.36:2.1: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.36:2.9: Rūpañce, bhante, nānuseti na taṁ anumīyati;
sn22.36:2.10: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.36:2.15: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.36:2.16: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.36:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
sn22.36:3.10: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, nānuseti na taṁ anumīyati;
sn22.36:3.11: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.36:3.16: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.36:3.17: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.36:3.18: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
